actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a refundable income tax credit of $1,000 for purchasing a new American-made passenger automobile.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individual taxpayers a refundable income tax credit of $1,000 for purchasing, between February 28, 1981, and March 1, 1982, a new 1981 model American-made passenger automobile.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a refundable income tax credit of $1,000 for purchasing a new American-made passenger automobile.
